price: Dize, Muhammad: "Sou, apenas, admoestador. E não há deus senão Allah, O Único, O Dominador,
arabic: قُلۡ إِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ مُنذِرٞۖ وَمَا مِنۡ إِلَٰهٍ إِلَّا ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡوَٰحِدُ ٱلۡقَهَّارُ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: qul innamā anā mundhirun wamā min ilāhin illā al-lahu al-wāḥidu al-qahāru
